form.title: Write permission for branches
form.group-name-help-text: Select the group to be privileged for the branch
form.user-name-help-text: Select the user to be privileged for the branch
form.branch-help-text: Enter a branch name or a pattern like feature/* {mail}/* {username}/feature* {mail} and {username} would be replaced with the user mail and username

confirm-delete.title: Delete Branch Permission
confirm-delete.message: Do you really want to delete the Branch Permission?

scm-branchwp-plugin.is-enabled-help-text: If enabled, nobody can write to the repository expect administrators, repository owners and the specified rules.

*.description: May modify repository specific branch permissions
